topic_metadata.title: Is Typst planning to support WebP as image format?

posts.name: Josí Neto
posts.cooked: Hi! WebP is an image format very well suited for archival purposes, because it supports both lossless and lossy compression, as well as alpha transparency. So, I’d like to know: are there any plans to support it in Typst?
posts.raw: Hi! [WebP](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebP) is an image format very well suited for archival purposes, because it supports both lossless and lossy compression, as well as alpha transparency. So, I'd like to know: are there any plans to support it in Typst?

posts.name: Pascal Quach
posts.cooked:
No, the plan is to support is through the plugin system instead of having it built-in.

github.com/typst/typst

Comment by laurmaedje - Adding WebP support

typst:main ← Conando025:main

> I'm leaning towards instead using the plugin system to add more image formats.… Since there were no further arguments in favor of having it built-in and I agree with this, I'm gonna go ahead and close this.
posts.raw:
No, the plan is to support is through the plugin system instead of having it built-in.

https://github.com/typst/typst/pull/2925#issuecomment-1875075352

posts.name: Josí Neto
posts.cooked: Oh, it’s sad, but at least is viable… thank you for answering!
posts.raw: Oh, it's sad, but at least is viable... thank you for answering!

posts.cooked: A community member, @frozolotl is currently hard at work to create a new API in Typst which makes it easier to write plugins for additional image formats. According to their talk, they have a prototype that supports, among other image formats, WebP. So support for WebP might be just around the corner.
posts.raw: A community member, @frozolotl is currently hard at work to create a new API in Typst which makes it easier to write plugins for additional image formats. According to their [talk](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rmjXkiXrASg), they have a prototype that supports, among other image formats, WebP. So support for WebP might be just around the corner.

posts.name: Nikolai Neff-Sarnow
posts.cooked: There are already plugins available, e.g. grayness – Typst Universe can work with webp.
posts.raw: There are already plugins available, e.g. https://typst.app/universe/package/grayness/ can work with webp.

posts.name: Josí Neto
posts.cooked: Thank you! It’s a bit convoluted though…
posts.raw: Thank you! It's a bit convoluted though...

posts.name: Nikolai Neff-Sarnow
posts.cooked: yes I know, unfortunately it’s currently not possible to be simpler. This might change with the coming typst versions though.
posts.raw: yes I know, unfortunately it's currently not possible to be simpler. This might change with the coming typst versions though.
